mapper.select: SELECT b.boardNum, b.title, b.content, u.nickName, b.regDate, b.viewCnt, ( SELECT count(*) FROM reply r WHERE r.boardNum = b.boardNum ) as replyCnt FROM board b, users u WHERE b.userId = u.userId ORDER BY boardNum desc, regDate desc;

SELECT b.boardNum, b.title, b.content, b.regDate, b.viewCnt, count(r.replyNum) as replyCnt, b.userId, u.nickName FROM board b, users u, reply r WHERE b.userId = u.userId and b.boardNum = ${boardNum} and b.boardNum = r.boardNum;
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET viewCnt = viewCnt + 1 WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum}
